item.description:
Swing, Salsa, & Foxtrot

You've seen it on TV, now come do it yourself. Have fun, get in shape and look great at clubs, parties and weddings. This is a beginner class
covering the basics, so all are welcome. Salsa and Swing are the most popular ballroom dances in America, upbeat and high energy; with Foxtrot you'll glide gracefully down the floor to the classic music of Sinatra,
Michael Buble and Rod Stewart.
Partners are suggested but not necessary. Please wear comfortable clothes and shoes that can slide on a hardwood floor, no sandals.
Instructor: Laurent Mullen, co-owner of
Let's Dance in Rhythm, has taught ballroom dance for 10 years, is a retired professional ballet dancer and is a current actor/dancer/vocalist, & member of NDCA, SAG & AFTRA.

www.LetsDanceBranford.com

Tuesdays, 7:15-8:15pm
5 weeks: March 25-April 22
Fee: $50/person
$85/couple
item.how_to_find_us: I am the studio owner so I'll be there.
item.why: It's fun to dance with other friendly people, it is excellent exercise and you'll never only sit and watch at weddings, cruises and parties ever again.
item.name: Swing, Salsa and Foxtrot Class
